short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to search for words in the Māori dictionary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables you to select a word in your browser, right-click to bring up a context menu, and search Te Aka (online Māori Dictionary) for that word in a new tab.
